A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really wanted to like it\, and watched it a second time. Fundamentally a horrible movie. Take the star wars name out of it\, and all the emotion on both sides. It was an awful movie with wasted character dev\, poor story\, and completely unnecessary plot holes. Lazily written\, and for all of the resources and legacy at their disposal\, Disney should be ashamed.
